isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - Remove CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcproc.title: Remove CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with cab door latch assembly (Item 2, Figure 76) . Door striker pin removal requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting hole in cab lock pillar permits adjustment.
Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 3) to remove cab door striker pin (Item 1) from cab lock pillar (Item 2), driver side shown.
If spacer shims (Item 4) are used between cab door striker pin (Item 1) and cab lock pillar (Item 2), save and reuse during installation, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 77. Driver Side Cab Door Striker Pin

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN, 34 TO 50 Lbf-ft (46 TO 68 N•m)
